head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LALLY, MARTIN T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LALLY, MARTIN T.

block.p: LALLY-Martin T., age 67, of Lakewood, New Jersey. Formerly of Old Bridge, New Jersey, on May 2, 2000. Beloved husband of Mary-Jane Nolan. Loving father of Martin T. Jr., Francis X., Brian T., Thomas S., Patricia Ann, Kathryn Ann, Mary Ann and KerryAnn. Dear brother of Richard. Devoted grandfather of 13 and expecting grandfather of 2. Funeral services Friday, 9 AM at Michael Hegarty Funeral Home, 3377 Route 9, Old Bridge, New Jersey. A Mass is to follow at 10 AM, St. Ambrose, Old Bridge. Burial Holy Cross Burial Park, South Brunswick, New Jersey. Visitation on Wednesday 7-9 and Thursday 2-4 and 7-9.
